attributes.action: Extend the £5000 nursing grant/bursary to September 2017 Nursing students
attributes.additional_details: It is only right that this group of students are recompensed for their loyalty, dedication and service on the Covid-19 frontline when called on by the Government. They are the only group of students not to receive a bursary or the £5000 free nursing grant afforded to all other groups. This is unfair and they should be rewarded.
attributes.background: September 2017 nursing students are the only group in recent times that have not received a penny from Government. They are now to work on the frontline against the Covid-19 virus for the benefit the UK. Recognise this by giving them £5000 announced in the budget for all other groups of nurses

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300079

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
